tool_description: An API that allows you to Gather information about all the anime being released in a season, and much more...
name: Anime Hub
title: Anime Hub

api_list.name: User
Pictures

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier of this anime

api_list.name: Stats

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier of this anime

api_list.name: Recommendations

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier of this anime

api_list.name: Reviews

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier of this anime

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: [optionnal] The number of reviews to skip

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: [optionnal] The number max of reviews to fetch - can be really long if omit

api_list.name: Episodes
News
WatchList

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Optional, can be either anime or manga

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description: Useful to paginate. Is the number of results you want to start from. By default, MAL returns 300 entries only.

api_list.name: Season

optional_parameters.name: season
optional_parameters.description:
default: winter.
The season, must be either spring, summer, fall or winter

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type, must be either TV, TVNew, TVCon, ONAs, OVAs, Specials or Movies
